verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
For You have been a refuge for me,
My strength when I am weak.
So I will live in Thy house for ever more,
Lift my hands up to Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Chorus:
From the ends of the earth,
Will I cry unto Thee.
When my heart is overwhelmed,
Lead me to the Rock
That is higher than I.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
For You've given me an inheritance
With those who fear Thy name.
So I will live in Thy house for ever more,
Lift my hands up to Thee.
